room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Did prison escape with my family and was probably the most fun I had in Orlando! Would definitely do it again next visit!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: We had so much fun doing this. We escaped the Prison Break and it's really all about communication. There was 5 of us and it was tons of fun. You need to be able to work well with your team mates in order to escape.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: We are already planning to come back soon! The hour flew by while we were working together solving all the puzzles to escape the prison. Everybody pitched in and had an awesome time!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Such an incredible experience for everybody. Maybe not for little kids. But a great place to go with your family or friends to really build your relationship with them. I would greatly recommend this. I went once and had to go again the very next day. Can't wait to come back and and do another escape.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: It was the most amazing experience we recommend it we did the prision beak we were 4 it's hectic and you have to think but it was worth it so much fun. We escape wooohhoooo

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: Well what a brilliant evening! This was my first experience and I'm hooked! We escaped the prison and then went on and escaped heist too! All staff were helpful, polite and enthusiastic. I would highly recommend to everyone who's thinking of doing it! Great value too!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: The Escape Game Orlando is the fourth escape-room company I've visited, and after my first experience there yesterday, it's absolutely vying for the top position. We had an amazing time doing the Prison Break room. It's hard to write a review of such a place, because it's absolutely vital that it remain spoiler-free, so that everyone has a chance to have such a great experience. I can tell you that there were several features of the room that were completely unique, not found in any of the other escape rooms I've visited so far. Each of these was a complete surprise, and added immeasurably to the overall experience. We had a team of 5, and it was one of the few rooms I've played that I think we really needed a good sized group. Usually my girlfriend and I do these rooms just the two of us, but this time, I don't think we could have solved it without at least 2 other teammates. The clues and devices were well hidden throughout the game, and the mechanisms for obtaining some of them were simultaneously logical and innovative. There was, quite literally, a surprise around every corner, and every victory led to more and more puzzles to solve, right up to the very end. We had an absolutely fantastic time, and I can't wait to go back and experience the other rooms at The Escape Game Orlando.
